mapper.select:
select a.*,b.total_trade_num,b.buy_num,b.sell_num,b.jmr_num,b.jmr_num/a.total_volume*100 from ( select data_date, fund_pool_code, stock_code, max(stock_name) as stock_name, max(current_price) as current_price, sum(ifnull(recent_market_value,0)) as market_value , sum(ifnull(profit_loss_value,0)) as profit_loss_value, sum(ifnull(total_volume,0)) as total_volume, sum(ifnull(available_sell_volume,0)) as available_sell_volume, sum(ifnull(total_volume,0)*cost_price)/sum(ifnull(total_volume,0)) as cost_price from tcdb.t_securities_trader_hold where 1=1
group by data_date,fund_pool_code,stock_code ) a left join ( select tmp.data_date, tmp.fund_pool_code, tmp.stock_code, sum(ifnull(tmp.buy_num,0)) as buy_num, sum(ifnull(tmp.sell_num,0)) as sell_num, sum(ifnull(tmp.buy_num,0)+ifnull(tmp.sell_num,0)) as total_trade_num, sum(ifnull(tmp.buy_num,0)-ifnull(tmp.sell_num,0)) as jmr_num from ( select data_date,fund_pool_code,stock_code,stock_name,case when bs_flag='0' then transaction_vloume else 0 end as buy_num,case when bs_flag='1' then transaction_vloume else 0 end as sell_num from tcdb.t_securities_trader_entrust where 1=1
)tmp group by tmp.data_date,tmp.fund_pool_code,tmp.stock_code ) b on a.data_date=b.data_date and a.fund_pool_code=b.fund_pool_code and a.stock_code=b.stock_code
order by a.data_date desc,a.stock_code asc

select data_date,fund_pool_code,action_time,bs_flag,bs_flag_desc,stock_code,stock_name,status_desc,order_no,order_price,order_volume,transaction_vloume,transaction_price,transaction_vloume*transaction_price as transaction_amt from tcdb.t_securities_trader_entrust where bs_flag in ('0','1')
order by data_date desc,action_time desc

select sum(order_volume ) as order_volume, sum(transaction_vloume ) as transaction_vloume, sum(transaction_vloume*transaction_price) as transaction_amt, count(*) as total_num from tcdb.t_securities_trader_entrust where bs_flag in ('0','1')

select date_format(entrust_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as entrust_time,tei.entrust_type,acc.account_no,account_name,tei.fund_pool_code,buy_sell_flag,stock_code,stock_name,entrust_status,securities_trader_entrust_no,entrust_price,entrust_num,deal_num,deal_price,deal_amt,source_sys_code from tcdb.t_trade_entrust_info tei inner join tcdb.t_account acc on tei.account_no=acc.account_no where 1=1
order by entrust_time desc

select sum(entrust_num) as entrust_num, sum(deal_num) as deal_num, sum(deal_amt) as deal_amt, count(*) as total_num from tcdb.t_trade_entrust_info tei inner join tcdb.t_account acc on tei.account_no=acc.account_no where 1=1

select tmp.securities_account_no, tmp.data_date, tmp.stock_code, tmp.fund_pool_code, max(stock_name) as stock_name, sum(tmp.buy_num+tmp.sell_num) as total_trade_num, sum(tmp.buy_num) as buy_num , sum(tmp.sell_num) as sell_num from ( select data_date, fund_pool_code, securities_account_no, stock_code, stock_name, case when bs_flag='0' then transaction_vloume else 0 end as buy_num, case when bs_flag='1' then transaction_vloume else 0 end as sell_num from tcdb.t_securities_trader_entrust where 1=1
) tmp group by tmp.securities_account_no,tmp.stock_code,tmp.data_date,tmp.fund_pool_code order by tmp.data_date desc,tmp.stock_code,tmp.securities_account_no desc limit 50;

select sum(sss.total_trade_num) as total_trade_num, sum(sss.buy_num) as buy_num , sum(sss.sell_num) as sell_num, count(*) as total_num FROM ( select tmp.securities_account_no, tmp.data_date, tmp.stock_code, tmp.fund_pool_code, max(stock_name) as stock_name, sum(tmp.buy_num+tmp.sell_num) as total_trade_num, sum(tmp.buy_num) as buy_num , sum(tmp.sell_num) as sell_num from ( select data_date, fund_pool_code, securities_account_no, stock_code, stock_name, case when bs_flag='0' then transaction_vloume else 0 end as buy_num, case when bs_flag='1' then transaction_vloume else 0 end as sell_num from tcdb.t_securities_trader_entrust where 1=1
) tmp group by tmp.securities_account_no,tmp.stock_code,tmp.data_date,tmp.fund_pool_code ) sss

select fcpc.account_no, acc.account_name,fcpc.stock_code, max(c.current_price) as current_price, max(fcpc.stock_name) as stock_name, sum(fcpc.last_remain_num) as last_remain_num, sum(fcpc.current_enable_num) as current_enable_num, sum(fcpc.current_remain_num) as current_remain_num, sum(fcpc.current_remain_num*c.current_price) as recent_market_value, sum(fcpc.current_remain_num*c.current_price-fcpc.total_buy_amt ) as profit_loss_value, sum(fcpc.current_remain_num*c.current_price-fcpc.total_buy_amt )/ sum(fcpc.total_buy_amt)*100 as profit_loss_radio, sum(fcpc.current_in_num) as current_in_num, sum(fcpc.current_out_freeze_num) as current_out_freeze_num, sum(fcpc.current_out_complete_num) as current_out_complete_num , sum(fcpc.total_buy_amt) as total_buy_amt, sum(fcpc.total_buy_amt)/sum(current_remain_num) as cost_price from t_fund_chnl_position_current fcpc inner join t_account acc on fcpc.account_no=acc.account_no inner join (select stock_code,current_price from riskdb.r_stock_value_info where data_dt=(select max(data_dt) from riskdb.r_stock_value_info)) c on fcpc.stock_code=c.stock_code where acc.account_status!=5
group by fcpc.account_no, acc.account_name,fcpc.stock_code
order by fcpc.stock_code asc

select sum(tmp.last_remain_num) as last_remain_num, sum(tmp.current_enable_num) as current_enable_num, sum(tmp.current_remain_num) as current_remain_num, sum(tmp.recent_market_value) as recent_market_value, sum(tmp.profit_loss_value ) as profit_loss_value, sum(tmp.current_in_num) as current_in_num, sum(tmp.current_out_freeze_num) as current_out_freeze_num, sum(tmp.current_out_complete_num) as current_out_complete_num , sum(tmp.total_buy_amt) as total_buy_amt, count(*) as total_num from ( select fcpc.account_no,fcpc.stock_code, sum(fcpc.last_remain_num) as last_remain_num, sum(fcpc.current_enable_num) as current_enable_num, sum(fcpc.current_remain_num) as current_remain_num, sum(fcpc.current_remain_num*c.current_price) as recent_market_value, sum(fcpc.current_remain_num*c.current_price-fcpc.total_buy_amt ) as profit_loss_value, sum(fcpc.current_in_num) as current_in_num, sum(fcpc.current_out_freeze_num) as current_out_freeze_num, sum(fcpc.current_out_complete_num) as current_out_complete_num , sum(fcpc.total_buy_amt) as total_buy_amt from t_fund_chnl_position_current fcpc inner join t_account acc on fcpc.account_no=acc.account_no inner join (select stock_code,current_price from riskdb.r_stock_value_info where data_dt=(select max(data_dt) from riskdb.r_stock_value_info)) c on fcpc.stock_code=c.stock_code where acc.account_status!=5
group by fcpc.account_no,fcpc.stock_code ) tmp
